title: Battle of the titans: Fact-checking arch-rivals in race for Nigeria’s presidency
subtitle: The ruling APC and opposition PDP are expected to dominate rescheduled 23 February elections. But how do their standard-bearers fare with their facts?
author: africacheck.org
vclaim:
This week, Nigerians will elect a president. They are spoilt for choice:

But did they get their facts right? We checked eight notable claims. We have contacted both campaigns for their evidence and will update this report should they respond.
